title: AE插件：变形扭曲(变脸)插件 REVisionFX REFlex 5.2.8 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: 这是一款AE变形扭曲插件，可制作复杂变形的扭曲效果动画，能绘制需要扭曲的区域，可完成变脸特效。适用于Win/Mac位版本的 After Effects 软件（CS5 - CC 2018），v5.2.8更新支持AE CC 2018并修复相关bug 。官方地址：http://www.revisionfx.com/products/reflex/ 。

download_links.name: Win 系统下载（城通网盘）
Mac 系统下载（城通网盘）
Win 系统下载（百度网盘）
Mac 系统下载（百度网盘）

other.更新内容英文: Fixes a bug where blank, incomplete or “random” images were produced. RE:Flex brings intuitive morphing and warping to After Effects and Fusion! Superior results are achieved using RE:Vision Effects’ proprietary and sophisticated technology. RE:Flex is especially easy to learn because it uses the host program’s own drawing and masking tools (when available) to direct the warping and morphing; as such, there is no need to learn a whole new user interface.
